channel.title: Anything better than MoparScape?
channel.description:
I really hate to be asking this but are there any other programs for running private servers that are better than Moparscape because whenever theres a medium amount of lag on a server MoparScape disconnects me and then I can't log back in unless I disconnect and reconnect my internet or restart my laptop.
The server I'm trying to connect to is online and I know it, but for some reason Mopar just wont connect me. No-one else on the server appears to be having this problem.
So I'm wondering if there's any other programs that can run no-ip servers, hamachi servers, ip servers, w/e.

item.title: Anything better than MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

hAMACHI DOES NOTHING, Helps internet connection to join other peoples PRIVATE-Servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Anything better than MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @ImmortalKaine ImmortalKaine
item.description:
@ImmortalKaine wrote:

It won’t connect

ph0nepl0x.no-ip.info
43594

I was on it, organizing my bank (I’m an J-Mod) and it crashed. I’d keep trying to connect and it wouldn’t connect. I finally restarted my laptop and it worked. Then the 2nd time I disconnected my internet, then reconnected and it worked.’

Now neither of them are working.

What now?

Read full topic

I already downloaded Hamachi >.<
